section.title: Success Stories from
section.description: Hear firsthand experiences from companies we've helped in their IPO journey.

testimonials.name: Ahmad Wijaya
testimonials.content: Global Sinergi Kapital provided highly professional guidance in our IPO process. Their team was very responsive and understood the specific needs of the technology industry.

testimonials.name: Siti Nurhaliza
testimonials.position: Finance Director, PT Retail Sejahtera Tbk
testimonials.content: The initially complex IPO process became more structured thanks to GSK's guidance. They helped us at every stage with great detail.

testimonials.name: Budi Santoso
testimonials.position: Chief Commissioner, PT Energi Hijau Indonesia Tbk
testimonials.content: GSK team's expertise in valuation and IPO pricing strategy greatly helped us achieve optimal results in the capital market.

testimonials.name: Maya Anggraini
testimonials.content: GSK not only helped in the IPO process but also prepared us to become a good public company with strong governance.

testimonials.name: Rudi Hermawan
testimonials.position: President Director, PT Logistik Global Tbk
testimonials.content: GSK team is very experienced and has an extensive network. They helped us get the best underwriter for our IPO.

testimonials.name: Dewi Lestari
testimonials.content: GSK's innovative approach in using technology to accelerate the IPO documentation process was very efficient and saved our time.
